markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157))    **Effect** You cause one of the tentacles forming the weapon's five barrels to stretch out and attempt to pull and grab a creature within 15 feet. The tentacle attempts to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) with a +13 bonus. It can attempt to Grapple any creature, regardless of size. On a success, the tentacle [pulls](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the creature up to 10 feet directly towards you, until it's in a square adjacent to you.
name: Interact (magical, transmutation)
